backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user registration and login with approval workflow, blog post management, and admin access control using MixinAuthorization and UserApproval modules.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining OldActor and NewActor types for blog posts, currently implementing a pass-through migration strategy.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features for registration form wiring, login authentication flow, route guards with approval checks, and admin panel functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files describing their purpose and implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including sidebar, chart, and UI component colors.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with SEO meta tags for Hâ˜…S Online Earn Platform, robots indexing directive, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/public/registration.html: Duplicate HTML entry point for registration route with identical SEO configuration and React mounting structure.
frontend/public/registration/index.html: Another duplicate HTML entry point for registration nested route with same SEO and mounting configuration.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all search engines to index the site and specifying sitemap location.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all site pages including home, registration, blog, tasks, payment proof, support, and individual blog posts with priorities and change frequencies.
frontend/scripts/README-sitemap.md: Documentation explaining when and how to update the sitemap.xml file when adding, removing, or changing blog posts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, blog, about, tasks, payment proof, support, registration, and admin panel pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserListTa: Admin component that displays a table of registered users with their approval status (pending/approved/rejected) and provides approve/reject actions using backend queries and mutations.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogPostCar: Displays a single blog post card with title, published date, excerpt, and a link to the full post detail page.
frontend/src/components/home/DailyTaskSe: Shows a daily task section where users click a button to open random external links, collect secret codes from those links, and submit them via a form.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero section with responsive background images, a welcome headline in English, Bengali description text, and a CTA button linking to the registration page.
frontend/src/components/home/TimeBucksMe: Promotional card for TimeBucks earning platform with Bengali text, highlighting $1 signup bonus and $2-$5 daily earning potential, with external link button.
frontend/src/components/home/TimeBucksSt: Step-by-step guide section in Bengali explaining how to sign up, verify, and earn money on TimeBucks platform with numbered steps and special notes.
frontend/src/components/home/TranscribeM: Promotional card for TranscribeMe audio transcription work with Bengali instructions, step-by-step guide, payment details, and external link to job application.
frontend/src/components/home/WelcomeSect: Welcome section with Bengali greeting message from Md. Habibur Rahman introducing the website's purpose of teaching free online earning methods.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileMen: Mobile navigation menu component with slide-in panel, backdrop overlay, escape key handling, and body scroll locking. Includes links to home, work tasks (Task 1-3), payment proof, support, and a 'Get Started' button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Site footer component displaying copyright info, owner details (Md. Habibur Rahman), WhatsApp contact link, quick navigation links, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky site header with logo, desktop navigation menu (home, work tasks dropdown, payment proof, support), mobile menu toggle, and 'Get Started' button. Uses TanStack Router for navigation and active link highlighting.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Main layout wrapper component that renders fixed background with parallax effect, dark overlay, and contains SiteHeader, main content outlet, and SiteFooter in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/monetization/AdP: Placeholder component for advertisement spaces with three variants (banner, sidebar, in-content) displaying dashed border boxes with 'Advertisement Space' text and external link icon.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Ads: Adsterra native banner ad component that dynamically loads the Adsterra script and renders the ad container div, with script cleanup on unmount and duplicate prevention.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Aff: Placeholder component for affiliate product recommendations displaying a card with tag icon, customizable title/description, and 'Learn More' button.
frontend/src/components/registration/Log: Login form component with email/username and password fields, password visibility toggle, error handling, and integration with useLoginUser mutation and auth context.
frontend/src/components/registration/Reg: Registration form component with fields for username, WhatsApp number (11 digits starting with 01), group number, email, and password. Includes validation, error handling, success dialog, and integration with useRegisterUser mutation.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: React component that dynamically updates document title, meta tags (description, Open Graph, Twitter Card), and canonical URL for SEO purposes using useEffect.
frontend/src/components/tasks/ApprovalGu: Guard component that checks user authentication and approval status, redirecting unauthenticated users to registration and showing a pending message for unapproved users while allowing admins full access.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskHowToC: Static instructional component displaying a numbered 4-step guide for completing tasks (start work, find code, paste code, submit).
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskIntera: Task interaction UI with a button to open task URL in new tab and a form to submit secret codes with success feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with identity-based authentication, initializing access control with admin token from URL params and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthContext.tsx: React context provider for authentication state management, persisting user login profile to localStorage and providing login/logout functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogPosts.ts: React Query hooks for fetching blog posts (all posts, single post by slug, search posts), with fallback to sample posts when actor is unavailable or requests fail.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout flows, and identity state with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks and mutations for user management operations including registration, login, approval checks, admin checks, and user listing with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines extensive CSS custom properties for theming (light/dark modes), neon color palettes, and responsive background images with overlays.
frontend/src/lib/blogSampleFallback.ts: Exports sample blog posts as fallback data when the backend is unavailable, including full content for posts about passive income and digital marketing.
frontend/src/lib/helpLinks.ts: Exports an array of help links with labels and Facebook profile URLs for two admins.
frontend/src/lib/registrationConfig.ts: Configuration object containing a Google Form embed URL for the registration page.
frontend/src/lib/siteConfig.ts: Site-wide configuration for SEO metadata including site name, description, URL, and default image path.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page component displaying biography, expertise sections, contact information, and social media links with SEO metadata and ad placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin panel page that checks caller admin status and displays UserListTable for managing users, or shows access denied message for non-admins.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Blog listing page that fetches and displays blog posts in a grid layout with loading states, error handling, and ad placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Individual blog post page that fetches post by slug and displays full content with formatted date, ad placements, and affiliate link placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component that renders HeroSection and WelcomeSection components with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentProofPage.tsx: Displays a gallery of payment proof images from successful members with an upload button linking to a Google Form. Includes SEO metadata and Bengali text for headings.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Registration and login page with tabbed interface, hero section with background image, and conditional rendering based on authentication status. Redirects authenticated users to tasks.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Contact support page displaying two administrator cards (Habibur Rahman and Sumaiya) with Facebook profile links for user assistance.
frontend/src/pages/Task1Page.tsx: Task 1 page with approval guard, task instructions, interaction card for completing the task via external URL, and back navigation button.
frontend/src/pages/Task2Page.tsx: Task 2 page with approval guard, task instructions, interaction card for completing the task via external URL, and back navigation button.
frontend/src/pages/Task3Page.tsx: Task 3 page with approval guard, task instructions, interaction card for completing the task via external URL, and back navigation button.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color schemes (neon, rainbow), container settings, extended theme properties, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file containing architectural notes, known issues, existing features, and requirements for a Bengali blog site with registration, payment proof gallery, and ad placeholders. Current version 57 focuses on replacing a Google Form with a built-in registration form and updating the Hero CTA button.
